name: BasicKit
title: AyrAs Basic Kit
author: AyrA
description: Mod for the 'No crafting' challenge without the need for new items. It will disable all sort of hand crafting in the game and replaces your starter inventory with the 3 basic items needed to bootstrap everything.
description_original: Mod for the 'No crafting' challenge without the need for new items. It will disable all sort of hand crafting in the game and replaces your starter inventory with the 3 basic items needed to bootstrap everything.
